import React from'react';import{attachUniversalProps}from'./helpers/universal-props';/**
 * <Alert />
 * 
 * Show a short and temporary message
 * 
 * ```jsx
 * <Alert
 *   open={true}
 * >
 *   Message sent
 * </Alert>
 * ```
 */function Alert(props){var classNames=['alegrify-alert'];classNames.push(props.className);return React.createElement("dialog",{className:classNames.join(' '),open:props.open},props.children);}Alert.defaultProps={open:false,className:''};export default attachUniversalProps(Alert);Alert.__docgenInfo={"description":"<Alert />\n\nShow a short and temporary message\n\n```jsx\n<Alert\n  open={true}\n>\n  Message sent\n</Alert>\n```","methods":[],"displayName":"Alert","props":{"open":{"defaultValue":{"value":"false","computed":false},"type":{"name":"bool"},"required":false,"description":"Show the alert?"},"className":{"defaultValue":{"value":"''","computed":false},"type":{"name":"string"},"required":false,"description":"Additional classnames"},"children":{"type":{"name":"union","value":[{"name":"arrayOf","value":{"name":"node"}},{"name":"node"}]},"required":true,"description":"Content of the alert"}}};
